aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.intro: Welcome! I am a developer who loves to create modern web applications using the latest technologies.
aboutMe.description: I specialize in React, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, and I always look for ways to improve the user experience through clean code and modern design.
aboutProject.title: About the project
aboutProject.intro: This project is built using the Atomic Design pattern, which allows for better organization and reusability of components.
aboutProject.tech.react: React with TypeScript for type safety
